name: Spooky House Adventure
overview: It's 20 minutes to midnight on Halloween. On a bet you're about to explore the neighborhood's haunted house. You have 20 minutes to escape before Dracula comes to kill you. This game is a conversion of the game Haunted House published in 1979 by Radio Shack. The puzzles are more or less the same but the map is different and the time limit with Dracula has been added.
